name: Ghost in the Tel
description:
Ghost in the Tel is an AR mobile game where ghosts spawn around you and try to eat you. Keep them in your line of sight to get rid of them!

Some bonuses will appear around you, move your phone towards them to collect them!

TEAM

Programming

Valentin Betrancourt

Nassim Lougrada

Julien Crépin

Art & Music

Nicolas Ceriani
